description.zh-cn: 前中共中央党校党建教研部教授，因严厉批判习近平及中国共产党而被开除党籍并取消退休待遇。她被视为党内的自由派学者，现居美国。
description.en: A former professor at the Party Building Teaching and Research Department of the Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party, who was expelled from the party and had her retirement benefits canceled for severely criticizing Xi Jinping and the CCP. She is considered a liberal scholar within the party and currently resides in the United States.

en: Central Party School of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党培养党的高中级领导干部和马克思主义理论干部的最高学府。
description.en: The highest educational institution of the Chinese Communist Party for training high- and mid-level party leaders and Marxist theorists.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党苏州市委员会下属的党校。
description.en: The party school under the Suzhou Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国大陆发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期中国大陆青年学生自发组成的学生组织。
description.en: Student-led paramilitary social movements mobilized and guided by Mao Zedong in 1966 and 1967, during the first phase of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
en: Constitutional Amendment of the People's Republic of China (2018)

description.zh-cn: 2018年通过的中华人民共和国宪法修正案，主要内容包括取消国家主席和副主席的任期限制。
description.en: The 2018 constitutional amendment of the PRC, which includes the removal of term limits for the President and Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 习近平提出的政治理论，指中国特色社会主义道路自信、理论自信、制度自信、文化自信。
description.en: A political theory proposed by Xi Jinping, referring to confidence in the path, theory, system, and culture of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

description.zh-cn: 习近平提出的政治要求，指政治意识、大局意识、核心意识、看齐意识。
description.en: A political requirement proposed by Xi Jinping, referring to consciousness of politics, the bigger picture, the core, and alignment.

description.zh-cn: 习近平提出的政治要求，指坚决维护习近平总书记党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，坚决维护党中央权威和集中统一领导。
description.en: A political requirement proposed by Xi Jinping, referring to resolutely upholding General Secretary Xi Jinping's core position on the Party Central Committee and in the Party as a whole, and resolutely upholding the Party Central Committee's authority and its centralized, unified leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，原北京市华远集团党委副书记，因批评习近平而被判处有期徒刑。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur and former deputy party secretary of Huayuan Group, who was sentenced to prison for criticizing Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 2016年5月在北京发生的一起备受争议的民众死亡事件，雷洋在被警方拘捕过程中死亡，该事件引发了公众对执法权的广泛质疑。
description.en: A controversial death incident that occurred in Beijing in May 2016, where Lei Yang died during police custody, sparking widespread public questioning of law enforcement powers.

description.zh-cn: 1989年在中国北京发生的一系列学生和民众示威活动，最终被武力镇压。
description.en: A series of student and citizen demonstrations in Beijing, China in 1989, which were ultimately suppressed by military force.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on Safeguarding National Security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 由全国人民代表大会常务委员会制定的一部适用于香港特别行政区的法律，旨在维护国家安全。
description.en: A law enacted by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress applicable to the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, aimed at safeguarding national security.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国家副主席、中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice President and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，作家，曾任国防大学政治委员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, author, and former Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，曾任国务院总理、中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府为应对2019冠状病毒病疫情采取的一系列严厉防控措施，旨在彻底消除病毒传播。
description.en: A series of strict control measures adopted by the Chinese government in response to the COVID-19 pandemic, aimed at completely eliminating the transmission of the virus.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由江泽民提出的中国共产党指导思想，要求中国共产党始终代表中国先进社会生产力的发展要求，代表中国先进文化的前进方向，代表中国最广大人民的根本利益。
description.en: A guiding ideology of the Chinese Communist Party proposed by Jiang Zemin, requiring the CCP to always represent the development trends of China's advanced social productive forces, the orientations of an advanced culture, and the fundamental interests of the overwhelming majority of the Chinese people.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指在政党内部实行民主原则和制度，是现代政党制度的重要组成部分。
description.en: Refers to the implementation of democratic principles and systems within a political party, an important component of modern political party systems.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China, which he ruled as the chairman of the Chinese Communist Party from its establishment in 1949 until his death in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1952年10月出生于江苏省常州市。
description.en: Cai Xia was born in Changzhou, Jiangsu Province in October 1952.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1969年加入中国共产党，后于2020年8月17日被开除党籍。
description.en: Cai Xia joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1969 and was expelled on August 17, 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央党校于2020年8月17日宣布开除蔡霞的中国共产党党籍，并取消其相关退休待遇。
description.en: On August 17, 2020, the Central Party School of the CCP announced the expulsion of Cai Xia from the Chinese Communist Party and the cancellation of her related retirement benefits.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1969年参军入伍，1978年退伍。
description.en: Cai Xia joined the army in 1969 and was discharged in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞在文化大革命期间曾是红卫兵。
description.en: Cai Xia was a Red Guard during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1984年，蔡霞被选送到苏州市委党校二年制党政干部大专班学习。
description.en: In 1984, Cai Xia was selected to study in a two-year program for party and government cadres at the Suzhou Municipal Party School.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1986年毕业时受邀留校任教。
description.en: Upon graduation in 1986, Cai Xia was invited to stay and teach at the school.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞于1992年考入中共中央党校，先后攻读硕士和博士学位，2000年获法学博士学位。
description.en: Cai Xia was admitted to the Central Party School of the CCP in 1992, where she pursued master's and doctoral degrees, obtaining her Doctor of Law degree in 2000.

position.en: Professor at the Party Building Teaching and Research Department

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞在中共中央党校任教，直至2012年退休。
description.en: Cai Xia taught at the Central Party School of the CCP until her retirement in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞公开严厉批判中共中央总书记习近平，称其为“黑帮老大”，导致她被开除党籍。
description.en: Cai Xia publicly and severely criticized CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping, calling him a 'mafia boss', which led to her expulsion from the party.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞反对2018年取消国家主席任期制的修宪，认为其从党内程序上不合法。
description.en: Cai Xia opposed the 2018 constitutional amendment that removed presidential term limits, believing it was procedurally illegitimate within the party.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞公开抨击习近平提出的“四个自信”等政治口号。
description.en: Cai Xia publicly criticized political slogans proposed by Xi Jinping, including the 'Four Confidences'.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞公开抨击习近平提出的“四个意识”等政治口号。
description.en: Cai Xia publicly criticized political slogans proposed by Xi Jinping, including the 'Four Consciousnesses'.

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞公开抨击习近平提出的“两个维护”等政治口号。
description.en: Cai Xia publicly criticized political slogans proposed by Xi Jinping, including the 'Two Upholds'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 蔡霞撰写文章反对《港区国安法》，认为它会毁掉香港的法治和自由秩序。
description.en: Cai Xia wrote articles opposing the Hong Kong National Security Law, arguing that it would destroy Hong Kong's rule of law and free order.

description.zh-cn: 2016年，蔡霞发表文章引用党章党规，支持党员任志强拥有发表批评意见的权利。
description.en: In 2016, Cai Xia published an article citing the party constitution and regulations to support party member Ren Zhiqiang's right to express critical opinions.

description.zh-cn: 1989年的六四事件使蔡霞对解放军向学生开火的行为感到十分震惊，影响了她的政治观点。
description.en: The 1989 Tiananmen Square incident deeply shocked Cai Xia due to the PLA's use of force against students, influencing her political views.

description.zh-cn: 由于不满中共对雷洋事件的处理，蔡霞对中共彻底失去信心。
description.en: Due to dissatisfaction with the CCP's handling of the Lei Yang incident, Cai Xia completely lost faith in the party.

description.zh-cn: 据蔡霞披露，王岐山曾向朋友抱怨，他与其他常委同习近平的关系已成为“君臣关系”。
description.en: According to Cai Xia, Wang Qishan once complained to a friend that his relationship and that of other Standing Committee members with Xi Jinping had become one of 'ruler and subject'.

description.zh-cn: 2017年左右，刘亚洲因写信建议习近平调整新疆政策而被警告不要再妄议习近平的政策。
description.en: Around 2017, Liu Yazhou was warned not to question Xi Jinping's policies again after writing a letter suggesting adjustments to the Xinjiang policy.

description.zh-cn: 2020年1月上旬，习近平拒绝了总理李克强就新冠疫情启动应急响应机制的提议。
description.en: In early January 2020, Xi Jinping rejected Premier Li Keqiang's proposal to activate an emergency response mechanism for the COVID-19 outbreak.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年3月上海疫情爆发后，习近平拒绝专家和地方官员放宽隔离的建议，坚持强制执行清零政策。
description.en: After the Shanghai outbreak in March 2022, Xi Jinping rejected suggestions from experts and local officials to ease quarantine measures and insisted on enforcing the zero-COVID policy.

description.zh-cn: “三个代表”重要思想由时任中共中央总书记江泽民提出。
description.en: The 'Three Represents' theory was proposed by then-CCP General Secretary Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，蔡霞参与了《“三个代表”重要思想学习纲要》的编写工作。
description.en: In 2003, Cai Xia participated in the compilation of the 'Study Outline for the Important Thought of Three Represents'.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在2007年中共十七大报告中首次提出了“尊重党员主体地位”的论断，推动了党内民主的讨论。
description.en: In his report to the 17th Party Congress in 2007, Hu Jintao first introduced the assertion of 'respecting the principal status of party members,' promoting discussions on intra-party democracy.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命由时任中共中央主席毛泽东发动和领导。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution was initiated and led by then-CCP Chairman Mao Zedong.
